price: Dájúdájú àwa mọ àmọ̀dájú pé àwa kò lè mórí bọ́ mọ́ Allāhu lọ́wọ́ lórí ilẹ̀. Àwa kò sì lè sá mọ́ Ọn lọ́wọ́.
arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعۡجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَن نُّعۡجِزَهُۥ هَرَبٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā ẓanannā an lan nuʿ'jiza al-laha fī al-arḍi walan nuʿ'jizahu haraban
